TopicTitle: How do I do mod modeling?

Articles.Content: Ok, I have no idea how to model parts but want to learn. How should I go about doing this? I have been invited to help another modder with getting his pack updated.

This link should help you out: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-New-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-New-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation)
